text: Giacomo Bazzan (13 January 1950 - 24 December 2019) was an Italian cyclist. He competed in the team pursuit event at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Italian male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Italy Category:Cyclists at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Veneto Category:Tour de France cyclists
title: Giacomo Bazzan
